column2: Crown Obligations represent the various obligations of vassals against you.

Crown Levy dictate how many levies vassals have to give you, which will override their opinion of you and your demesne laws if they'd result in less levies.

Tolerance determines the rights of non-humans and various cultural and religional minorities of the realm.
